name: Folivora's Fall
description:
In Folivora’s Fall, you play as a young sloth that must escape a haunted mansion to find their way back home. 

Manipulate magical contraptions to open sealed doors that block the path through the mansion. 
Climb and sneak along the overgrown woodwork to evade predatory animal ghosts and beware of the mansion's guard dog.

ArtistsDesigners and ProducersProgrammersAtte MielonenJesse StolkCas OlischlägerAxel CremersKenny de JongDanny OosterwijkKristine BruilSebastiaan van der KruijsGuy van der MeulenTim BuhrsMartijn Vahl
